      • albedoEmissionMap

        public R2Texture2DUsableType albedoEmissionMap()
        Specified by:
        albedoEmissionMap in interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
        Returns:
        A texture with the surface albedo in the (r, g, b) components and the emission level in the alpha component.

      • emissionIntensity

        public float emissionIntensity()
        A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from the albedoEmissionMap() are multiplied. This effectively allows control over the intensity of the emission effect in the final image.
        Specified by:
        emissionIntensity in interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
        Returns:
        The intensity of the emissive sections of the image

      • glowIntensity

        public float glowIntensity()
        A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from any produced glow maps are multiplied. This effectively allows control over the intensity of the glow effect in the final image.
        Specified by:
        glowIntensity in interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
        Returns:
        The intensity of the glow sections of the image

      • blurParameters

        public Optional<R2BlurParameters> blurParameters()
        Specified by:
        blurParameters in interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
        Returns:
        The blur parameters, if blurring is to be used

      • scale

        public float scale()
        If blurring is to be used, the value returned here specifies the scale at which the intermediate emissive step is rendered. If blurring is not going to be used, the emission image is simply blended into the existing framebuffer without any intermediate framebuffers, and therefore the scale value given here is ignored.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
        Returns:
        The scale to use for unblurred intermediate framebuffers
